issue.description:
The reference of the mapping of Item_design_association to Product_version (as proposed_design) is wrong: it should reach product_definition_formation (and not product_definition)
Conditions Under Which the Issue Was Discovered: Module development

description.p: The existing scope and introduction of this module does not really address what the module does. The module is about the identification of a product configuration i.e. how a product is assembled, not about the identification of configuration items.
Because of this, configuration management experts in industry have significant issues with the terminology used.
The name of the entity Configuration_watched_item is confusing. A better name would be Product_configuration.

ul.li: Identification of the configuration of a product for a given product concept.

description.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of product configurations for a given product concept.

comment.description: Reject because already balloted and several using modules exist.
Reopened due to whinging from PLCS. Accept, Fixed.
